mapper.select: SELECT p.product_no, p.product_name FROM Product p, Product_type t, Factory f, Branch b WHERE p.product_type_no = t.product_type_no AND t.product_type_no = f.product_type_no AND b.branch_no = f.branch_no AND b.branch_no = ( SELECT branch_no FROM Employee WHERE emp_code = #{emp_code})

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, t1.* FROM( select a.product_no,b.product_type_name,a.product_name,a.product_price from product a,Product_type b where a.product_type_no = b.product_type_no ORDER BY a.product_no ASC ) t1 ) t2 WHERE t2.rnum >= (#{curr_page}-1)*10+1 AND t2.rnum <= #{curr_page}*10
select count(*) from (select a.product_no,b.product_type_name,a.product_name,a.product_price from product a,Product_type b where a.product_type_no = b.product_type_no)
SELECT p.product_no, p.product_name FROM Product p, Store_order_detail d WHERE p.product_no = d.product_no AND d.store_order_detail_no = #{store_order_detail_no}

select product.* from product,store_order_detail,process_management,branch,employee,store_order_reservation where product.product_no = store_order_detail.product_no and process_management.store_order_detail_no = store_order_detail.store_order_detail_no and process_management.branch_no = branch.branch_no and store_order_reservation.emp_code = employee.emp_code and store_order_reservation.store_order_res_code = store_order_detail.store_order_res_code
and store_order_reservation.emp_code = #{emp_code} and store_order_reservation.store_order_res_no = #{store_order_res_no} and process_management.store_order_detail_no = store_order_detail.store_order_detail_no and process_management.store_order_detail_no = #{store_order_detail_no}
